episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the history of the sandwich, unusual causes of death, notable people with famous names, and the history of contact lenses.

facts.fact: The first ever sandwich that we know about contained wine.
In 2003, three people in Mexico died of acne.
The first contact lenses cost as much as a car.
This week, I bought a copy of "This Is Improbable 2" by Mark Abrams.
